name: com_comment
comment: Every comment on a wiki page creates a comment row.

columns.name: c_id
columns.comment: Unique ID to identify each comment

columns.name: c_page
columns.comment: Key to page.page_id. This should never be invalid

columns.name: c_actor
columns.comment: Key to actor.actor_id of the user or IP who made this comment

columns.name: c_timestamp
columns.comment: Timestamp of when the comment was created

columns.name: c_parent
columns.comment: If this comment is a response to another comment, this is a key to that comment's c_id

columns.name: c_deleted
columns.comment: Boolean for whether the comment is deleted or not

columns.name: c_rating
columns.comment: The comment's current rating. Not intended to be an accurate copy of SUM(*)

columns.name: c_html
columns.comment: Parsed HTML of the comment, generated at the time the comment was saved/edited

columns.name: c_wikitext
columns.comment: Wikitext of the comment, used for populating the textarea when the comment is edited

columns.name: c_edited_timestamp
columns.comment: Timestamp of when the comment was last edited

name: com_rating
comment: A row for each user's interaction (upvote/downvote) with an individual comment

columns.name: cr_actor
columns.comment: Key to actor.actor_id of the user or IP who made this rating

columns.name: cr_rating
columns.comment: Integer representation of the rating (-1 or 1)
